alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:08PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stanley, south central Hughes and north central Lyman Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Cedar Creek Rec Area, or 17 miles southeast of Pierre, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Creek Rec Area around 1225 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Aberdeen.
